mapper.select: select valueId,valueName from Dictionary where typeCode='JS' group by valueId limit #{pageIndex},#{pageSize}
select count(0) from Dictionary where typeCode='JS'
select valueId,valueName from Dictionary where typeCode='ZC'
select valueId,valueName from Dictionary where typeCode='JS'
select valueId,valueName from Dictionary where typeCode='JS' and valueId=#{valueId}
mapper.update: update Dictionary set valueName=#{valueName} where typeCode='JS' and valueId=#{valueId}
mapper.delete: delete from Dictionary where typeCode='JS' and valueId=#{valueId}
